title: I'm gunna go cry in a corner

replies.body:
you got +LP they got loss prevented because of server issues (which probably was the reason you were a 4v5)


its cool you guys won with a team of only 4 but whats the problem here?

Nothing just feel a little short-changed... 
Should I add something to make this story more interesting?
I found fifty dollars?
I ate a nutella and peanut butter croissant? (try it, it'll change your life)
Sorry for having a whinge :')

Dude everyone won in that game, be happy with that. 

you won a great game, ranked is about improving, and winning a 4v5 shows your skills are on point! - be proud of that fact alone, not the 10LP (side note. the system wanted you to play another game before promos regardless)

P.S
the only reason why i'm being nice right now is because of the  **nutella and peanut butter croissant idea**

Have a great day

Hahaha yeah I know, I think I was annoyed more because the other team were being giant tools about it post-game. Oh well, bronze life huh?
You too enjoy your croissants :)

you gotta ignore that %%%%.

in settings i have /ALLCHAT Switched off during ranked games

in post i honor/report those who was worthy and move on. if i want to look at the stats i just click in my game history.

SIDENOTE:

they are improving that too so youll just be able to click leave post and review stats
here is a pic of the improvements coming

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SxLbvSp1frI/VNKBSDwM2EI/AAAAAAAAjeY/Y-C8yhwe1kI/s1600/profile1.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yUbTYgikP1I/VNKBSPjMfDI/AAAAAAAAjeU/xKwqhhokhlk/s1600/2.jpg
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JJ-0PaeZrYc/VNKbckKoo4I/AAAAAAAAje4/zBSX9AlJGgA/s1600/3.jpg

anyways have a good day
Where did u get ravenreds/the joysticks tips from D:
i do not understand the question.
Where did u get those tips from?

Oh from here good sir
http://www.surrenderat20.net/

nutella and peanut butter? sounds.. dangerously experimental lol.

worth a shot I guess but i'm not a fan of nutella really
